name: setroles
description: Set default player roles for a new game

name: status
description: Show voting status of current daytime.

name: vote
description: A command for everyone to vote an user.

name: kill
description: A command for a Werewolf to kill an user.

name: guard
description: A command for a Guard to guard an user.

name: seer
description: A command for a Seer to seer an user.

name: reborn
description: A command for a Witch to reborn an user.

name: ship
description: A command for a Cupid to ship 2 users.
